The rar's essentially act as one giant compression file broken into bite-sized files for transfer. Open any one, extract the iso and mount it with daemon tools or whatnot. The crack directory is ON the iso, so it must be mounted (or burned) first.

i realy wana play the freking game lol

Dang noobs. ;)

You don't OPEN iso files. You MOUNT iso files. WinRAR opens isos, but they're CD images. Google DaemonTools and mount the .iso
I haven't downloaded it yet, but I'm going to assume it's a normal release.
That means that the virtual drive that Daemon Tools made will now have a DVD in it. (That is, Windows Explorer will think there's a DVD player with a DVD in it.)
That DVD will more or less be exactly the same as the retail DVD, except there will be an additional crack directory in it. That's the thing you're looking for.

YOU LEGEND!

FFTL, first, rename the .exe file in the game directory or cut it and paste it into a different directory.  Next, copy the crack file and paste it into the game directory to replace the original file that you renamed or cut from the directory.  When you click the icon from the game directory, that should work for you.
Hi so i uploaded it and i did what the readme file reads but when i try to play it says Wrong disc intrested so can some1 help?

Awesome Awesome Awesome!

Thanks so much works like a charm, wonderFULL!!!!

OK GUYS IF YOUR GETTING THE WRONG DISC INSERTED ERROR THIS IS WHAT YOU HAVE TO DO!

1. Take out the Aventcast.exe file from the game directory that the files are installed in. Either rename it or delete it. 

2. Open the crack folder, take the .exe file from inside, and move it to where the original aventcast.exe file was. 

3. Run the game from the new crack file you just moved, itll start up normally.

ENJOY AND THANKS AGAIN!!!!

Thanks, works great.
A crack is not needed; just install the latest retail patch 1.04, it removes the protection.
Official 1.04 patch which removes DRM: http://avencast.com/downloads/Avencast_patch_v104.exe
